description:
HELLO! My name is Tracy Joy and I have been in the newborn photography business since 2008. My love of photography and babies has thrived through the years, and I am happy to share and spread the happiness that I have learned.

This "beginner" course will help walk through my steps in Lightroom to Photoshop, showing how I correct newborn skin.

  1. Starting in Lightroom and correcting skin tone and exposure.
  2. Why to shoot in RAW
  3. Export to Photoshop
  4. Skin tones
  5. Fixing blemishes
  6. Saving and Export for Facebook

HOPE YOU ENJOY!
title: Newborn Photoshop & Lightroom Basics
